element.name: dcat:CatalogRecord
element.label: Catalog Record
element.description: Catalog-related information

element.name: rdf:about
element.label: Record URI
element.description: Landing page of the record

element.name: dct:conformsTo
element.label: Conforms to
element.description: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

element.name: dct:Standard
element.label: Standard
element.description: An established standard to which the described resource conforms. This property SHOULD be used to indicate the model, schema, ontology, view or profile that the catalog record metadata conforms to.

element.name: foaf:primaryTopic
element.label: Resource (Dataset or DataService)
element.description: The dcat:Resource (dataset or service) described in the record.

element.name: dcat:Dataset
element.label: Dataset
element.description: A dataset is a collection of data, published or curated by a single agent. Data comes in many forms including numbers, words, pixels, imagery, sound and other multi-media, and potentially other types, any of which might be collected into a dataset.

element.name: dct:language
element.label: Language
element.description: A language of the item. This refers to the natural language used for textual metadata (i.e. titles, descriptions, etc) of a cataloged resource (i.e. dataset or service) or the textual values of a dataset distribution

element.name: rdf:resource
element.label: Record language
element.description: A language of the item. This refers to the natural language used for textual metadata (i.e. titles, descriptions, etc) of a cataloged resource (i.e. dataset or service) or the textual values of a dataset distribution

element.name: rdf:resource
element.label: Dataset language
element.description: The language of the dataset.

element.name: rdf:resource
element.label: Service language
element.description: The language of the service.

element.name: dct:identifier
element.label: Identifier
element.description: A unique identifier of the item.

element.name: dct:issued
element.label: Publication date
element.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the item.

element.name: dct:issued
element.label: Publication date
element.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the record in the catalog.

element.name: dct:modified
element.label: Modification date
element.description: Most recent date on which the element was changed, updated or modified.

element.name: dct:modified
element.label: Modification date
element.description: Most recent date on which the catalog record was changed, updated or modified.

element.name: dct:title
element.label: Title
element.description: A name given to the item.

element.name: dct:description
element.label: Description
element.description: A free-text account of the record.

element.name: dcat:contactPoint
element.label: Point of contact
element.description: Contact information for the cataloged resource.

element.name: vcard:Organization
element.label: Organization
element.description: An organization is a single entity, and might represent a business or government, a department or division within a business or government, a club, an association, or the like.

element.name: vcard:hasAddress
element.label: Address
element.description: Postal address

element.name: vcard:Address
element.label: Address
element.description: Postal address

element.name: vcard:street-address
element.label: Street
element.description: Street name and number

element.name: vcard:locality
element.label: Locality
element.description: City/Municipality

element.name: vcard:postal-code
element.label: Postal code
element.description: Zip code

element.name: vcard:hasURL
element.label: Website
element.description: Website URL

element.name: vcard:hasTelephone
element.label: Phone number
element.description: Phone number, with country indicator

element.name: dct:creator
element.label: Creator
element.description: The entity responsible for producing the resource.

element.name: dct:publisher
element.label: Publisher
element.description: The entity responsible for making the item available.

element.name: dct:issued
element.label: Release date
element.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

element.name: dct:modified
element.label: Update/modification date
element.description: Most recent date on which the resource was changed, updated or modified.

element.name: dcat:landingPage
element.label: Landing page
element.description: A Web page that can be navigated to in a Web browser to gain access to the catalog, a dataset, its distributions and/or additional information.

element.name: dct:accessRights
element.label: Access Rights
element.description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

element.name: dct:license
element.label: License
element.description: A legal document under which the resource is made available.

element.name: dct:LicenseDocument
element.label: License document
element.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.

element.name: dct:rights
element.label: Rights
element.description: Information about rights held in and over the distribution.

element.name: dct:RightsStatement
element.label: Rights statement
element.description: A rights statement that concerns how the distribution is accessed.

element.name: odrl:hasPolicy
element.label: Policy
element.description: An ODRL conformant policy expressing the rights associated with the resource.

element.name: prov:qualifiedAttribution
element.label: Qualified attribution
element.description: Link to an Agent having some form of responsibility for the resource

element.name: dct:relation
element.label: Relation
element.description: A related resource. Recommended practice is to identify the related resource by means of a URI. If this is not possible or feasible, a string conforming to a formal identification system may be provided.

element.name: dcat:qualifiedRelation
element.label: Qualified relation
element.description: Link to a description of a relationship with another resource

element.name: dct:isReferencedBy
element.label: Referenced by
element.description: A related resource, such as a publication, that references, cites, or otherwise points to the cataloged resource.

element.name: dcat:distribution
element.label: Distribution
element.description: An available distribution of the dataset.

element.name: dcat:Distribution
element.label: Distribution
element.description: A specific representation of a dataset. A dataset might be available in multiple serializations that may differ in various ways, including natural language, media-type or format, schematic organization, temporal and spatial resolution, level of detail or profiles (which might specify any or all of the above).

element.name: dcat:accessService
element.label: Access service
element.description: A data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset

element.name: dcat:mediaType
element.label: Media type
element.description: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA.

element.name: dcat:packageFormat
element.label: Package format
element.description: The package format of the distribution in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together.

element.name: dcat:byteSize
element.label: Byte size
element.description: The size of a distribution in bytes.

element.name: dcat:compressFormat
element.label: Compression format
element.description: The compression format of the distribution in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file.

element.name: dcat:temporalResolution
element.label: Temporal resolution
element.description: Minimum time period resolvable in the dataset.

element.name: dct:accrualPeriodicity
element.label: Accrual periodicity
element.description: The frequency at which dataset is published.

element.name: dct:spatial
element.label: Spatial extent
element.description: The geographical area covered by the dataset.

element.name: dct:temporal
element.label: Temporal extent
element.description: The temporal period that the dataset covers.

element.name: dct:PeriodOfTime
element.label: Period of time
element.description: The covered period of time

element.name: prov:wasGeneratedBy
element.label: Generated by (genealogy)
element.description: An activity that generated, or provides the business context for, the creation of the dataset.

element.name: dcat:DataService
element.label: Data Service
element.description: A collection of operations that provides access to one or more datasets or data processing functions.

element.name: dcat:endpointURL
element.label: Endpoint URL
element.description: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (a Web-resolvable IRI).

element.name: dcat:endpointDescription
element.label: Endpoint description
element.description: A description of the services available via the end-points, including their operations, parameters etc.

element.name: dcat:servesDataset
element.label: Served datasets
element.description: A collection of data that this data service can distribute.
